::The Lavacons::

Astral nods. "Ok. What shape is the building going to be in?"

He would have suggested a hill-type structure, because those could 
take more hits than normal standing buildings, but Wheeljack was in 
charge here and might have a better idea.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Well, i cant speak for everyone else, but i do not agree with 
you 
> kramsey.  I find it fun reading a ton of messages. Soulstice, the 
last time i 
> posted with Vulois was before my Vermont vacation. You probably 
replied, but 
> i didnt get it. We'll just say that Vulois asked him to join him in 
his quest 
> for peace, that ok?
> 
> :::Wheeljack/Cyclonus/Scourge/Time Warp:::
> 
> ::He gives Composer the Datapad::
> Wheeljack: First we have to set down the foundation.  After that we 
can start 
> the main structure.  Then some doors--on both sides, because the 
battle 
> location could vary.
> ~~~~~
> ::Cyclonus and Scourge reach the base, and shortly after they go 
in, they 
> hear Motormaster's transmission::
> Scourge: Unfortunate?
> Cyclonus: What could it be?
> Scourge: hmmmmm
> ::Scourge's eyes narrow and Cyclonus gets the hint. He has an angry 
look now 
> as well and clenches his fist::
> Cyclonus: Autobots...
> ~~~~~
> ::Time Warp sees all of the Radicons outside and hears them 
talking::
> Time Warp: Airbomber, what in the pit's going on?
